column1: Little Goat Diner////Ordered a Caesar salad to go.  Turns out
column3: at least not in the traditional sense.  Way too much going on in there.  Loved the radicchio
column4: but found the unexpected addition of red peppers
column5: zucchini and apples overwhelming.  The mint was a nice
column7: and the croutons were fantastic.  I was hoping for the punch of Parmesan and overall simplicity of a basic Caesar
column8: so I was a little disappointed.  I guess if that's the only thing on the menu that ends up disappointing
